text: Reusable items over disposables cut costs & help our oceans!
Exploring rock pools at low tide—costs nothing but time. Nature’s aquarium!
Temperamental tech sold at high prices? Nah, give me starry night sky watching any day - stellar show every time!
Consultancy fees for analyzing seaweed diets. 🤔
Nature never sticks to strict role plays - humans shouldn't either.
Out at sea handling equipment solo often leaves folks gobsmacked; guess not everyone expects tech savvy over brawn!
Physics? That’s just the start—measuring salinity levels accurately out here takes way more finesse than muscle!
Seeing shock on faces when you hoist up dive gear better than some blokes never gets old – strength isn't gendered!
Work's not the only escape hatch when you're solo! Some double down on community stuff or classes—I've seen folks become legends at trivia nights all post-breakup.
Solo travel costs me way more than date nights ever did!
Yet splurging on self-growth adventures beats gadget hoarding any day!
